text: Dang yi bu jingdian neng zhengshi tamen suoyou de jingdian, cong zhenzhu jianglin tamen de shihou,(tamen buxin ta). Yiqian tamen changchang qidao, xiwang jie ta lai kefu buxindao zhe, ran'er dang tamen yeyi renshi de zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen buxin ta. Gu zhenzhu de qi jue jia yu buxindao zhe.
